content.name: Kanye West
content.description: Kanye West is a Grammy Award-winning rapper and record producer and fashion designer.

content.name: Mark Zuckerberg
content.description: Co-founder and CEO of the social-networking website Facebook, as well as one of the world's youngest billionaires.

content.name: Cristina Fernández de Kirchner
content.description: Ms Fernández took over the presidency in 2007, succeeding her late husband Nestor Kirchner.

content.name: Malala Yousafzai
content.description: She is a human rights activist who advocates for the rights of women and girls and worldwide access to education.
